experience.title: Full Stack Developer
experience.description:
Financial auditing system for companies with help of AI tools

- Implementation of two-factor authentication (2FA) in Python server-side, to improve system security in user authorization.
- Developed system that creates an audit engagement based on documents provided by the company, using AWS services and AI tools.

AI-based code review system
- Integration of GPT API for analysis and generation of recommendations based on framework standards, architecture and/or conventions used in the company.
- Increased code quality and adherence to best practices and standards by developers.
- Reduction of code review time for senior developers by 50%, enabling faster development cycles.

Both projects deployed using Docker, ensuring software scalability and portability.
